entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:14 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 08:14 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:14 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
